name: Need for Speed 2 Special Edition
description:
Need for Speed 2 Special Edition is a racing-arcade game developed by Electronic Arts Canada, Electronic Arts Seattle and Pioneer Productions. It came out on 06-11-1997. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Need for Speed 2 Special Edition is available on PC.
It was produced by Hanno Lemke and Sam Nelson. Alistair Hirst, Matt Ragan, Robert Ridihalgh and Robert Ridihalgh (Game Gear) scored the game.
